title: List of Foreign Ambassadors Who Participated in Credentialing Ceremony â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
July 21, 2017
Below is a list of the foreign ambassadors who participated in the credentialing ceremony at the White House with the President today:Her Excellency Niermala Sakoentala Badrising, Ambassador of the Republic of Suriname
His Excellency Damiano Beleffi, Ambassador of the Republic of San Marino
His Excellency Stanislav Vidovic, Ambassador of the Republic of Slovenia
His Excellency Abdulla Rashed Abdulla Al Khalifa, Ambassador of the Kingdom of Bahrain
His Excellency Francisco Daniel Gutierez, Ambassador of Belize
His Excellency Camilo Reyes Rodriguez, Ambassador of the Republic of Colombia
His Royal Highness Prince Khalid bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, Ambassador of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
His Excellency Barfuor Adjei Barwuah, Ambassador of the Republic of Ghana
His Excellency Robert Sisilo, Ambassador of the Solomon Islands
His Excellency Samuelu Laloniu, Ambassador of Tuvalu
His Excellency Ali Naseer Mohamed, Ambassador of the Republic of Maldives
